H0.text: Which fruit did Nell Gwynn, mistress of King Charles II, sell in Drury Lane. Apples

H1.text: Which fruit did Nell Gwynn, mistress of King Charles II, sell in Drury Lane. Pears

H2.text: Which fruit did Nell Gwynn, mistress of King Charles II, sell in Drury Lane. Plums

H3.text: Which fruit did Nell Gwynn, mistress of King Charles II, sell in Drury Lane. Oranges

A4.text: Nell and her elder sister Rose were scantily-clad 'orange-girls', selling small, sweet 'china' oranges to the audience inside the theatre for a sixpence each.
